languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, губернатор Драйвстем всегда верно служил Вольным Торговцам фон Валанциус и беспокоился о будущем вашей торговой династии, а потому... род Гапрак считает, что его обвинения против дома Версериан заслуживают внимания". {n}Аугменты скрывают эмоции Торианы, но в ее голосе звучит тень робости.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость, губернатор Драйвстем всегда служил верностью Вольным Торговцам фон Воланциус и беспокоился о будущем вашей торговой династии, а потому... род Гапрак считает, что его обвинения против дома Версериан заслуживают внимания". {n}Аугменты скрывают эмоции Торианы, но в ее голосе звучит тень робости.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem has always faithfully served the Rogue Traders of House von Valancius and concerned himself with the future of your trade dynasty, and so... House Gaprak thinks his charges against House Werserian to be sound." {n}The augmetics hide Toriana's emotion, but her voice sounds slightly timorous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, губернатор Драйвстем всегда верно служил Вольным Торговцам фон Валанциус и беспокоился о будущем вашей торговой династии, а потому... род Гапрак считает, что его обвинения против дома Версериан заслуживают внимания". {n}Аугменты скрывают эмоции Торианы, но в ее голосе звучит тень робости.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem has always served the Rogue Traders of House von Valancius and expressed concern for the future of your trading dynasty, and so... House Gaprak thinks his accusations against House Werserian to be worthy of attention." {n}The augments hide Toriana's face, but her voice harbours a hint of bashfulness.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

House Gaprak thinks his charges against House Werserian to be sound." {n}The augmetics hide Toriana's emotion, but her voice sounds slightly timorous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem has always faithfully served the Rogue Traders of House von Valancius and concerned himself with the future of your trade dynasty, and so... House Gaprak thinks his charges against House Werserian to be sound." {n}The augmetics hide Toriana's emotion, but her voice sounds slightly timorous.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: 「陛下、ドライブステン総督は長い間、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の自由開拓者に忠実に仕え、陛下の貿易王朝としての将来を案じてこられました。ですから…ギャプラック家は、ウェルザリアン家への告訴は妥当だと考えます」{n}オーグメティックがトリアーナの感情を隠しているが、その声には少し弱々しく聞こえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem has always faithfully served the Rogue Traders of House von Valancius and concerned himself with the future of your trade dynasty, and so... House Gaprak thinks his charges against House Werserian to be sound." {n}The augmetics hide Toriana's emotion, but her voice sounds slightly timorous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、ドライブステン総督は長い間、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の自由開拓者に忠実に仕え、陛下の貿易王朝としての将来を案じてこられました。ですから…ギャプラック家は、ウェルザリアン家への告訴は妥当だと考えます」{n}オーグメティックがトリアーナの感情を隠しているが、その声には少し弱々しく聞こえる。{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: “大人，德莱夫斯塔总督这么多年来，一直忠心耿耿侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人，为贸易王朝的未来不辞劳苦、鞠躬尽瘁。因此……贾帕克家族认可他对韦尔森家族的指控。”{n}植入物隐去了托丽安娜的情绪，但她的声音仍流露出一丝胆怯。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem has always faithfully served the Rogue Traders of House von Valancius and concerned himself with the future of your trade dynasty, and so... House Gaprak thinks his charges against House Werserian to be sound." {n}The augmetics hide Toriana's emotion, but her voice sounds slightly timorous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人，德莱夫斯塔总督这么多年来，一直忠心耿耿侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人，为贸易王朝的未来不辞劳苦、鞠躬尽瘁。因此……贾帕克家族认可他对韦尔森家族的指控。”{n}植入物隐去了托丽安娜的情绪，但她的声音仍流露出一丝忸怩。{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, le gouverneur Drivestem a toujours fidèlement servi les libres-marchands de la maison von Valancius et fait part de ses inquiétudes concernant l'avenir de votre dynastie commerciale, donc... La maison Gaprak pense que ses accusations contre la maison Werserian sont solides. » {n}Bien que les augmétiques de Toriana vous empêchent de deviner ses émotions, sa voix est teintée de timidité.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem has always faithfully served the Rogue Traders of House von Valancius and concerned himself with the future of your trade dynasty, and so... House Gaprak thinks his charges against House Werserian to be sound." {n}The augmetics hide Toriana's emotion, but her voice sounds slightly timorous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, le gouverneur Drivestem a toujours servi les libres-marchands de la maison von Valancius et fait part de ses inquiétudes concernant l'avenir de votre dynastie commerciale, donc... la maison Gaprak pense que ses accusations contre la maison Werserian sont solides. » {n}Bien que les augmétiques de Toriana vous empêchent de deviner ses émotions, sa voix est teintée de timidité.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, el gobernador Drivestem siempre ha servido fielmente a los Comerciantes Independientes de la casa von Valancius y se ha preocupado por el futuro de su dinastía comercial, por lo que la casa Gaprak cree que las acusaciones contra la casa Werserian son sólidas». {n}Los auméticos esconden la emoción de Toriana, pero su voz alberga una pizca de timidez.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem has always faithfully served the Rogue Traders of House von Valancius and concerned himself with the future of your trade dynasty, and so... House Gaprak thinks his charges against House Werserian to be sound." {n}The augmetics hide Toriana's emotion, but her voice sounds slightly timorous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, el gobernador Drivestem siempre ha servido a los Comerciantes Independientes de la casa von Valancius y expresó su preocupación por el futuro de su dinastía comercial, por lo que la casa Gaprak cree que las acusaciones contra la casa Werserian son sólidas». {n}Los auméticos esconden la emoción de Toriana, pero su voz alberga una pizca de timidez.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Gouverneur Drivestem hat den Freihändlern des Hauses Valancius immer treu gedient und hatte stets die Zukunft Eurer Handelsdynastie im Blick, daher ... Daher hält Haus Gaprak seine Anschuldigungen gegen Haus Werserian für fundiert." {n}Die Augmentationen verbergen Torianas Emotionen, doch in ihrer Stimme liegt ein Hauch von Furcht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem has always faithfully served the Rogue Traders of House von Valancius and concerned himself with the future of your trade dynasty, and so... House Gaprak thinks his charges against House Werserian to be sound." {n}The augmetics hide Toriana's emotion, but her voice sounds slightly timorous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Gouverneur Drivestem hat den Freihändlern des Hauses Valancius immer gut gedient und Sorgen über die Zukunft Eurer Handelsdynastie geäußert, daher ... Daher hält Haus Gaprak seine Anschuldigungen gegen Haus Werserian für fundiert." {n}Die Augmentationen verbergen Torianas Emotionen, doch in ihrer Stimme liegt ein Hauch von Verlegenheit.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Vali Drivestem, von Valancius Hanesi Hür Tacirlerine daima bağlılıkla hizmet etmiştir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kendisi, her daim ticaret hanedanlığınızın geleceğini düşünmüştür... Bu yüzden Gaprak Hanesi, Werserian Hanesi'ne sunulan ithamların bir karşılığı olduğunu düşünüyor." {n}Ogmetikleri Toriana'nın duygularını gizlese de sesinde hafif bir gerginlik hissediliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem has always faithfully served the Rogue Traders of House von Valancius and concerned himself with the future of your trade dynasty, and so... House Gaprak thinks his charges against House Werserian to be sound." {n}The augmetics hide Toriana's emotion, but her voice sounds slightly timorous.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Vali Drivestem, von Valancius Hanesi Hür Tacirlerine daima bağlılıkla hizmet etmiştir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kendisi, ticaret hanedanlığınızın geleceğini düşünmüştür hep... Bu yüzden Gaprak Hanesi, Werserian Hanesine karşı yapılan ithamların bir karşılığı olduğunu düşünüyor." {n}Ogmetikleri Toriana'nın duygularını gizlese de sesinde hafif bir gerginlik var.{/n}
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak
